remarks: Value of the rank function.  Definition 9.14 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79 (proved as a theorem from our definition).  This variant of ~ rankval does not use Regularity, and so requires the assumption that ` A ` is in the range of ` R1 ` .  (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2013.)
statement:
rankvalb $p |- ( A e. U. ( R1 " On ) -> ( rank ` A ) = |^| { x e. On | A e. ( R1 ` suc x ) } ) $.
$d A x $.
